title: Uncle Si's Wife Discovers His Kryptonite
description:
Si is still recovering from his wife's podcast debut, and Phillip shares his favorite Christine story — the time he first saw her perform a simple maneuver to instantly drain Si's battery. Si is not a fan of the beach coming anywhere near his orifices. John-David's family runs into the sorriest rhinos ever — because they're goats. Si's kidneys may just be the eighth wonder of the world, and the scientist in Martin has questions. And the boys serve up advice on how to handle an in-law who overstays her welcome and how to quit a job.
-
